subject: Basketball
Basketball (College)
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Hofstra’s Charles Jenkins is expected to be the first New York City public school graduate to be selected in the first round of the N.B.A. draft since 2004.
snippet: Hofstra’s Charles Jenkins is expected to be the first New York City public school graduate to be selected in the first round of the N.B.A. draft since 2004.
